resources.string: Welcome to my tie app! My ties are made by combining elegance with a quirky twist. Each tie is individually embroidered with exquisite organza and velvet.

Here you can change the app from normal mode to a darker, night mode.

 When you click the switch the app will turn into night mode
 (You can do the same to reverse it)

 All other pages (activities) will restart so that they are now in dark mode
Want to buy a product? Send us an email!\n Enter subject below
Enter Content of email down below
Click to enter app for the first time
Welcome, please enter your name below
Click to see a random product idea \n (Available on my Facebook)
